I'm sometimes getting exceptions running configure.  One thing I noticed aside 
from the exception is that you are calling "C_CHECK_UPDATE_STATE" from within 
the ManagedProjectMiner.  You shouldn't have to do that because it will simply 
reroot the command back to your miner.  Instead you should make a direct call to 
your miner.  I imagine this was just a missed detail when you moved code from 
the UI down to the miner.
